Football, trial training for refugees at Sport-Union Berlin, every Wednesday at 20:00.
Exercise and free play for toddlers, space to race, climbing, jumping, swinging, rocking, rolling, throwing and catching. Age 2 to 4 years, Thursday, 16.15 - 17.30h

column5: Learn how to ride a bicycle: Regular open training sessions take place every third Sunday of the month from 2pm to 4pm at the Jugendverkehrsschule Wassertorplatz

Exercise and free play for toddlers, space to race, climbing, jumping, swinging, rocking, rolling, throwing and catching. Age 2 to 4 years, Friday 16.30 to 17.45, The outdoor offer takes place from May to October - also during the summer holidays.

Open sports-spanning movement and game offers. Game phase consists of many small games, e.g. Singing, Catching & Running Games. Age 5 to 7 years, date: Friday 16.30 bis 17.45 clock, The outdoor offer takes place from May to October - also in the summer holidays - instead.
Open sports-spanning movement and game offers. Game phase consists of many small games, e.g. Singing, Catching & Running Games. Age 5 to 7 years, date: Thursday, 16.15 - 17.30h.
column6: **Adress:** Werner-Seelenbinder-Sporthalle (Eingang rechts neben der, Schwimmhalle am Velodrom), Paul-Heyse-Straße 26, 10407 Berlin

column5: Open sports-spanning movement and game offers. Game phase consists of many small games, e.g. Singing, Catching & Running Games. Age 5 to 7 years, date: Wednesday, 16.15 - 17.30h
Play, Dance and Acrobatics. Interdisciplinary for children between 7 and 12 years. Appointment: Friday, 17.15 - 18.15h
Circus games, acrobatics, building human pyramids, juggling, riding a unicycle and dancing. Appointment: Tuesday from 16.00 to 17.00 - 8 to 11 years Tuesday from 17.00 to 18.00 - 12 to 15 years.

Everything that can be played with balls. Through football, hockey, basketball and many other sports, children between the ages of 7 and 11 playfully approach a variety of balls. Date: Thursday, 16.15 - 17.45h

column5: Different disciplines such as running, jumping high or far or even throwing far. Two age-appropriate groups from 6 to 8 and 9 to 11 years are offered. Dates: Monday 16:30 to 17:30 Group 6 to 8 years old. Monday 5:30 to 7:00 pm Group 9 to 11 years old.
Frisbee, Frisbee Golf and the cool Frisbee Team Sport Ultimate. From 6 to 12 years. Tuesday, 16.30 - 17.30h.
Learn to swim & swim for refugees, children and teenagers, women and men. Dates: Mondays & Thursdays - various times / depending on the group.
column6: **Adress:** Schwimmhalle im Märkischen Zentrum, Wilhelmsruher Damm 142 D, 13439 Berlin

column5: Syrian and Iraqi refugees are being trained as museum guides so that they can then provide guided museum tours for Syrian and Iraqi refugees in their native language
column6: **Adress:** c/o Museum für Islamische Kunst, Geschwister-Scholl-Straße 6, 10117 Berlin

column5: A collaboration of young refugees from the AWO Refugium am Kaiserdamm with the Berliner Festspiele and the Berlin University of the Arts.
The Young Arts Neukölln is an art and creative center for children and young people from Neukölln.
The Sharehaus Refugio in Berlin Neukölln is a community center where refugees and locals live and work together.
Berlin Mondiale focuses on initiating, guiding, and qualifying cross-generational and multi-discipline artistic collaborations within the context of migration, forced displacement, and exile.
Workshops and theater programs for all young people, with and without flight experience.
Animation workshops for children around adolescents at welcome and regular classes, in shelters, youth and cultural institutions throughout Berlin.
Dance workshops for children and adolescents
Music and dance theater projects with and for young people.
Mpower empowers girls and (young) women with refugee and migration experience (s) in their social and cultural resources, school skills, media literacy and career orientation.
column6: **Adress:** KommMit für Migranten und Flüchtlinge e.V, Birkenstraße 62, 10559 Berlin (Haus M  Eingang P  2.OG)

column5: Refugees show their perspective of Berlin and offer tours as city guides.
German-Syrian theater project
